info.abstract:
[Type] Metadata Access
[Behaviour] Request or set session data: session list, session creation date, authorized users, etc. Only session owner and administrators can submit the command.
[Parameters] - action : name of the action to be applied to session parameter; possible values are disable : disable a session (only the owner is authorized to submit the command) enable : enable a session (only the owner is authorized to submit the command) env : list environmental session variables grant : share the session with a list of users, assigning one or more of the following roles: "read" : the user can submit commands to read data and metadata from datasets; "write" : the user can submit commands to create new datasets; "execute" : the user can execute scripts; "admin" : the user can grant/revoke access privileges. list : list the session which the user can access to listusers : list session users with their roles new : create a new session remove : remove a session revoke : revoke the grants to a list of user setenv : set environmental session variables - session : link to intended session, by default it is the working session. - key : name of the parameter to be got/set. - value : value of the key set with the argument "key".
[System parameters] - sessionid : session identifier used server-side to manage sessions and jobs. Usually users don't need to use/modify it, except when it is necessary to create a new session or switch to another one. - objkey_filter : filter on the output of the operator written to file (default=all => no filter, none => no output). manage_session_list : show session data as text. manage_session_summary : show a summary as text.
[Examples] Get the session list: OPH_TERM: oph_manage_session list SUBMISSION STRING: "operator=oph_manage_session;action=list;" Get the user list of current session: OPH_TERM: oph_manage_session listusers Share the session with user "oph-test", assigning it the role "write": OPH_TERM: oph_manage_session grant user oph-test:write SUBMISSION STRING: "operator=oph_manage_session;action=listusers;"
